section.title: The cinder.zonemanager.drivers.brocade.brcd_http_fc_zone_client Module
section.paragraph: Brocade south bound connector to communicate with switch using HTTP or HTTPS protocol.

desc_content.paragraph: Bases: object
Add zone configuration.
This method will add the zone configuration passed by user.

field_body.paragraph: add_zones_info – Zone names mapped to members. Zone members are colon separated but case-insensitive

list_item.paragraph: activate – True will activate the zone config.
active_zone_set – Active zone set dict retrieved from get_active_zone_set method

desc_content.paragraph: Add the zones and cfgs map based on the new zones info.
This method will return the updated zones,cfgs and active_cfg

field_body.paragraph: updated zones, zone configs map, and active_cfg

desc_content.paragraph: Authenticate with the switch.
Returns authentication status with modified authentication header (Base64(username:xxx:random no)).
Change the VF context in the session.

list_item.paragraph: vfid – VFID to which context should be changed.
session_data – Session information from the switch

desc_content.paragraph: Check whether VF related configurations is valid and proceed.
Close session.
Connect to the switch using HTTP/HTTPS protocol.

list_item.paragraph: payload – Data to send with POST request

desc_content.paragraph: Create the authentication token.
Creates the authentication token to use in the authentication header return authentication header (Base64(username:password:random no)).
Delete zones from fabric.
Deletes zones in the active zone config.

list_item.paragraph: active_zone_set – the active zone set dict retrieved from get_active_zone_set method

desc_content.paragraph: Delete the zones and cfgs map based on the new zones info.
Return the updated zones, cfgs and active_cfg after deleting the required items.

field_body.paragraph: updated zones, zone config sets, and active zone config

desc_content.paragraph: Build the zone string in the required format.
Return the active zone configuration.
Return active zoneset from fabric. When none of the configurations are active then it will return empty map.

field_body.paragraph: Map – active zone set map in the following format

desc_content.paragraph: List of VFIDs that can be managed.

field_body.paragraph: session_info – Session information from the switch

desc_content.paragraph: Get name server data from fabric.
Return the connected node port wwn list(local and remote) for the given switch fabric.
Get the value for the key passed.
Return the sub string between the delimiters.
Get the session information from the switch
Parse all the zone information and store it in the dictionary.
Check firmware version is v6.4 or higher.
This API checks if the firmware version per the plug-in support level. This only checks major and minor version.

field_body.paragraph: True if firmware is supported else False.

desc_content.paragraph: To check whether VF is enabled or not.

field_body.paragraph: boolean to indicate VF enabled and session information

desc_content.paragraph: Send POST request to the switch with the payload.

field_body.paragraph: data – payload to be sent to switch

desc_content.paragraph: Update zone configuration.
This method will update the zone configuration passed by user.

field_body.paragraph: zone_info – Zone names mapped to members. Zone members are colon separated but case-insensitive

list_item.paragraph: activate – True will activate the zone config.
active_zone_set – Active zone set dict retrieved from get_active_zone_set method
